org.goobi.production.flow.statistics

Interface IStatisticalQuestion

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IStatisticalQuestionLimitedTimeframe
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    StatQuestCorrections, StatQuestProduction, StatQuestProjectAssociations, StatQuestProjectProgressData, StatQuestStorage, StatQuestThroughput, StatQuestUsergroups, StatQuestVolumeStatus

    public interface IStatisticalQuestion
    This interface defines the required methods for any implementations of statistical requests to be used with the StatisticalManager. There is an extension to this interface for implementations which needs time restriction to be set
    Author:
    Wulf Riebensahm, Steffen Hankiewicz

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<de.intranda.commons.chart.results.DataTable> getDataTables(IDataSource dataSource)
      This method returns a list of DataTable Objects, which can be used to display the results of the data request
      String getNumberFormatPattern()
      get number format pattern
      Boolean isRendererInverted(de.intranda.commons.chart.renderer.IRenderer inRenderer)
      get all IRenderer where the DataTable matrix should be used inverted
      void setCalculationUnit(CalculationUnit cu)
      This method sets the calculation unit needed for specific requests.
      void setTimeUnit(TimeUnit timeUnit)
      This method is used to set a grouping unit for time based data

      • setCalculationUnit

        void setCalculationUnit(CalculationUnit cu)
        This method sets the calculation unit needed for specific requests. Since not all implementations will support this feature future implementations of this method will throw an UnsupportedOperationException
        Parameters:
        cu -

      • isRendererInverted

        Boolean isRendererInverted(de.intranda.commons.chart.renderer.IRenderer inRenderer)
        get all IRenderer where the DataTable matrix should be used inverted
        Parameters:

        Returns:
